uvi.description:
usb: fix various gadget panics on 10gbps cabling

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.44 by commit b972eff874637402ddc4a7dd11fb22538a0b6d28. For more details please see the references link.
